faq.question: What is popstar Shop?
faq.answer: PopStar Shop is your one-stop shop for all things Kirby! We offer a wide selection of Kirby-themed plushies, bundles, and collectibles.

faq.question: Do you offer international shipping?
faq.answer: Yes! We ship worldwide, so no matter where you are, you can get your favorite Kirby items delivered right to your doorstep.

faq.question: Can I return or exchange an item?
faq.answer: We accept returns within 30 days of purchase. Items must be unused and in original packaging. For exchanges, please contact our customer service team.

faq.question: How can I contact customer service?
faq.answer: You can reach us via our Contact page, or send an email to support@popstarshop.com for any inquiries or concerns.
